texts.empty_leaderboard: Join now and win this totally real digital participation trophy
texts.lightning_start_description: {text} just delivered a devastating lightning attack. Play continues in a moment...
texts.question: Question {index} of {count}
texts.qr_venue_code_description: Scan the QR code on the TV
texts.join_global: Not in a venue, join anyway
texts.rules:
Each round has ten questions
Each question is worth a maximum of 1,000 points
Questions last 30 seconds
The quicker you answer, the more points you can earn.
texts.no_email_text: Add your email to redeem points
texts.add_email_title: Enter your email to redeem your points
texts.confirm_email_instructions: Please confirm your email by entering the 6-digit code
texts.report_player_description: Your report will be submitted to Atmosphere. Our moderation team will look over the reported player, and take action depending on our policy for usernames and avatar images. If a violation of our terms of use is found, the impacted player’s username or profile picture will be updated.
texts.report_submitted_subtitle: Our moderation team will review the report shortly
texts.report_submitted_message:
We appreciate you alerting us to this issue — our moderation team will take it from here.

A community is only as strong as its members - and we are thankful for those who speak up and help create a welcoming environment.
texts.camera_access_message: We use the camera to capture your in-game avatar and to scan QR codes to quickly join trivia sessions.
texts.avatar_pick_title: Choose where you’ll get your avatar from
texts.update_required_message:
Looks like you’re using an
older version of ChiveTrivia.
Update now to play!
texts.delete_user_message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This will permanently erase your account.
texts.redeem_points_description: Select an option from below to redeem your points
texts.redeem_points_confirmation: Are you sure you want to redeem {number} points with {name}? This cannot be undone.
texts.points_failed_transfer: We were unable to transfer your points, please try again later.
texts.redeeming_points_info: Redeeming your points. Please wait a moment.
texts.not_enough_points: You don’t have enough points to redeem this reward.
texts.insufficient_points_message: You currently don’t have enough points to redeem, keep playing to continue earning more!
